read.description: Read access selectors. Phase 1 supports workspace-only selectors (e.g., 'workspace:**'). 'host:/...' is reserved for future use and is not guaranteed to be enforced in all profiles.

write.description: Write access selectors. Phase 1 supports workspace-only selectors (e.g., 'workspace:**'). 'host:/...' is reserved for future use and is not guaranteed to be enforced in all profiles.

writable_roots.description: Phase 2c (Landlock enforcement): host-absolute directory paths where read+write is allowed. Derived from policy resolution. When present, takes precedence over read/write selectors for enforcement; the old fields remain for audit/UI.

read_only_subpaths.description: Phase 2c (Landlock enforcement): host-absolute directory paths where only read access is allowed. Derived from policy resolution.

FsPathSelectorV1.description: Selector syntax: 'workspace:**' (any path under /workspace), 'workspace:/relative/or/absolute/path', or reserved 'host:/absolute/path'.

HostAbsolutePathV1.description: Host-absolute directory path for Landlock enforcement. Must start with '/'. Path traversal components (.. and .) are rejected by the policy resolver.
